import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function EnterNameA(props) { const [nameA , setNameA] = useState("") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.history.push('/enter-name-B') } const setName = (e) => { setNameA(e.target.value); console.log(nameA) } return (
) }
